title: How to Kill the Avogadro in Tranzit

steps.title: Turn on the power
steps.content: Turn on the power . This will release the Avogadro.

steps.title: Go straight to town.
steps.content: Go straight to town. Buy Juggernog and maybe Stamin-Up.

steps.title: Wait for the Avogadro to show up.
steps.content: Wait for the Avogadro to show up. Once he does, wait until the coast is relatively clear, and attack.

steps.title: Get the Avogadro in humanoid form.
steps.content: Get the Avogadro in humanoid form. To do this, get relatively close to it, then immediately back away about 10 feet (3 m). He will temporarily shift into humanoid form to shoot lightning at you.

steps.title: Knife it while it is in its humanoid form.
steps.content: Knife it while it is in its humanoid form. Do this repeatedly 5 times.
